bug.author: ehennis
bug.summary: Eager Execution Guide link is broken
bug.description:
Please make sure that this is a documentation issue. As per our GitHub Policy, we only address code/doc bugs, performance issues, feature requests and build/installation issues on GitHub. tag:doc_template System information
TensorFlow version: v2.0 Doc Link: https://github.com/ehennis/Blog/tree/master/TensorFlow
Describe the documentation issue I was looking through the eager execution documentation and one of the links is missing the extension 'ipynb'. If you click on the "eager execution guide" the link is broken. Markdown Page: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ehennis/Blog/tree/master/TensorFlow>https://github.com/ehennis/Blog/tree/master/TensorFlow</denchmark-link> . We welcome contributions by users. Will you be able to update submit a PR (use the doc style guide) to fix the doc Issue?

comments.comment: The link you are pointing in this issue is incorrect since you are the owner of the repo. I think you meant this link for the <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/docs/tree/master/site/en/r2/tutorials/eager>eager execution guide</denchmark-link> . Can you please confirm?

Jeez, copy and paste issue. Here is the page: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/docs/blob/master/site/en/r2/tutorials/eager/index.md>https://github.com/tensorflow/docs/blob/master/site/en/r2/tutorials/eager/index.md</denchmark-link> . If you look at the link "eager execution guide" it goes to "<denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/docs/blob/master/site/en/r2/guide/eager>https://github.com/tensorflow/docs/blob/master/site/en/r2/guide/eager</denchmark-link> " which gets a 404.
I can edit the original if that would make more sense.
I will send PR to fix this. Thanks for the catch!
